c74object.name: ta.activity
c74object.description: Measures activity of an input data stream, using a threshold time in ms to detect when the stream is inactive. It also calculates a running time average between input events and a total count of events received.

inlet.digest: (anything) Meausure the activity of an input data stream

objarg.name: threshold
objarg.description: Time window considered for the activity value (left outlet). If there are no input events within this time window the acitivity output will be zero. (default = 600. ms)

objarg.name: resolution
objarg.description: Time window considered for the activity value (left outlet). If there are no input events within this time window the acitivity output will be zero. (default = 10. ms)

method.name: anything
method.digest: Measure the activity of input data
method.description: Increment number of messages reiceived (rightmost outlet). Recalculate running time average between events (middle-right outlet). Reset elapsed time since last activity (middle-left outlet). Turn activity value to 1 (leftmost outlet) if the previous value was 0, otherwise there will be no output.

method.name: int
method.description: The number is added to the sum of all numbers received up to that point, and the mean is sent out.

method.name: stop
method.digest: In left inlet: Stops the clocker object inside, without causing further output.
method.description: In left inlet: Stops the clocker object inside, without causing further output..

method.name: reset
method.digest: In left inlet: Resets all outlets to 0 without stopping or restarting the clock; clocker continues to report activity measurements at the same regular interval.
method.description: In left inlet: Resets the elapsed time to 0 without stopping or restarting the clock; clocker continues to report the new elapsed time at the same regular interval. Evev if ta.activity is not running this message will trigger 0 over all outlets, in a right-to-left outlet order.

entry.name: float
entry.description:
Out middle-right outlet: Running time average between iput events.
Out middle-left outlet: Elapsed time since the last event received. The count will stop once the threshold time is reached.

entry.name: int
entry.description:
Out rightmost outlet: How many input events have been considered for measurements since last inactive state.
Out left outlet: 1 or 0 reporting the activity of the input data stream. 0 means there was no activity for a period of time equal to or bigger than the threshold value. While 1 means there has or has been activity within the threshold time.
